meanings.definition: Soldiers trained to parachute from airplanes into combat zones.
meanings.sent1: The paratroopers jumped from the plane with their parachutes.
meanings.sent2: The paratroopers landed safely behind enemy lines.
meanings.sent3: The paratroopers had a race to see who could land closest to the target.
meanings.sent4: The paratroopers descended from the sky like silent angels of war.
meanings.sent5: The image of the paratroopers floating down will forever be etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: A member of a military unit trained to parachute into combat.
meanings.sent1: Each paratrooper carried out their mission with precision.
meanings.sent2: The paratrooper's bravery was commendable in the face of danger.
meanings.sent3: The paratrooper accidentally landed in a tree, much to the amusement of the others.
meanings.sent4: The paratrooper's descent into battle was like a swift and decisive strike.
meanings.sent5: The paratrooper's training made them a formidable force on the battlefield.
